Name: Gregory Cowgill
Text: Great food, great service, friendly staff. However, please just open at 7 and close at 11 every day, weekends included; there are students who depend on it and shouldn't have to wait to eat if they're particularly busy.

Name: lonelyjoe
Text:
The interior is neat and modern.
It is spacious enough for students to have a meal in a non-packed and relaxing environment. The beef&turkey lasagna that I had 2 days ago were much better than the lasagna I ate at a local Olive Garden :)

Name: Taesung Hwang
Text: Large dining hall with numerous food options throughout the day and comfortable, open social atmosphere.

Name: Busta
Text: I've been eating here as a student for a lil more than a month now, and I gotta say it aint half bad. It's got a nice variety of foods available everyday to an extent, and whenever I've had a tough workout in the morning, the 'eatery can provide the big d**k breakfast I require. There's been times where the breakfast becomes unavailable before 11am, sooner than expected, so I miss out on some of that french toast or pancakes, but we chillin wit the brunches. Even at its busiest, they bring out the food consistently and hastily with little gaps between when all the foods been taken. I commend the employees on their work ethic. Plus, the yogurt slaps. Seriously, try that yogurt and granola, that s**t is gas.

Name: Elena Melena
Text: Sometimes the food is nasty, but the cheeseburgers are absolutely bussin. Almost as good as in n out. No cap. Eggs look fake but are still good. They never have the Mexican drinks even tho the containers are always there. I suspect г@c!sm. The workers are very nice, love them all.

Name: Curtis Masa
Text: I ain't finna lie, the food was gas af the first few weeks of the quarter. Now its mid at best most of the time. Burgers, though, are always consistently cooked to perfection.

Name: Vince Lu
Text: The Anteatery is kind of far for me, but the tastes are not doubt.

Name: Emily Faith Cabrera Jackson
Text: The food is absolutely horrible. Onions and garlic in everything, almost like they don't know how to season food otherwise. Also between 2-5 nothing is open so you basically can only eat pizza and burgers. I've had that 4 days in a row, because I can't get there earlier. The only positive is that they have a freestyle machine and the sugar cookies are bomb

Name: Jinsmr 金糖伍
Text: This is a dining hall buffet style with a lot of options for each meal time. For example, during dinner there is a salad bar, soups, fresh fruits, many main entrees, pizzas, dessert, and drinks. The food tastes really delicious. Comfortable atmosphere. The staff are extremely kind and funny.

Name: Mario Moreno
Text: Good commissary to chill and grab a bite to eat..lots of variety and the cooks there are on top of things...believe me, i know..

Name: Chris Gravina
Text: The food quality varies a lot, some days it's good and other days are really bad. Taza, the coffee place right next to it, is a big plus, as they use Pete's coffee beans. Highlights would be the cookies and definitely the Lo Mein noodles. Finally, the staff is really friendly and the background music is good.

Name: Barracuda
Text: Pretty good. Pizza could use higher quality ingredients.

Name: Justin Lonh
Text: Food is okay, variety is good. Somewhat expensive for non-first years and non-students. Atmosphere is very nice and modern, variety of different seating options and furniture.

Name: QT Do
Text: Food is decent compared to the other dining halls but they serve onions with almost everything.

Name: Shobhit Mendiratta
Text: Various choices of food available.

Name: Kevin Li
Text: Way better than Lot 5 and Pippin's. It has a good variety of food

Name: Cindy Khuu
Text: Friendly, good food, good place to stay and eat, huge restaurants and a lot of parking

Name: Elizabeth Solorzano
Text: It's a college a you can eat dining place. The food isn't outstanding, it's okay.

Name: Devon Taylor
Text: im really offended that they don't have vegan tacos every taco tuesday

Name: Fred Hernandez
Text: Great food for students

Name: Troy Lee
Text: Rishi Trivedi's existence inside the Anteatery forced my hand in giving this place a 1 star review.

Name: Minnie
Text: Management very racist ....

Name: Timothy Kim
Text: Foods fine and the place is clean

Name: Ken Swensson
Text: Everything you need to eat is there.

Name: Victor Zhang
Text: Water tastes pretty good.

Name: Matthew Chan
Text: Best dining hall at UCI

Name: Ezra Monroy
Text: Consistent quality, Sustainability pioneers

Name: Raniel Jay Calilung
Text: I had better.

Name: Carlos Rodriguez
Text: it was the best period.

Text: Very nice place

Text: Nice environment

Text: Nice looking

Text: come slowly
